abstract: JPMorgan Chase plans to expand its work force of private bankers in the coming months as the wealthy move out of banks hit hard by the financial crisis and into stronger ones, the chief executive of its U.S. private bank said Monday.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase plans to expand its work force of private bankers in the coming months as the wealthy move out of banks hit hard by the financial crisis and into stronger ones, the chief executive of its U.S. private bank said Monday.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase plans to expand its work force of private bankers in the coming months as the wealthy move out of banks hit hard by the financial crisis and into stronger ones, the chief executive of its American private bank said Monday.

headline.main: JPMorgan Private Bank to Add Bankers
